description: Real-time team communication with rooms, reactions, and file sharing

test_cases.name: Chat Page Load
test_cases.description: Verify the chat page loads correctly with all components
steps: Verify sidebar is displayed with room list
test_cases.expected_result: Page loads with all components visible and functional

test_cases.name: Chat Rooms Display
test_cases.description: Verify chat rooms are displayed with correct information
steps: Verify rooms list is displayed in sidebar
Verify each room shows name and description
Verify room type is indicated (direct, group, channel)
Verify room icons are displayed correctly
Verify online status indicators are displayed
test_cases.expected_result: All chat rooms display with complete information

test_cases.name: Room Selection
test_cases.description: Test selecting a chat room and viewing messages
steps: Verify chat window displays room messages
Verify room name is shown in chat header
Verify message input field is available
test_cases.expected_result: Room selection works correctly and displays messages

test_cases.name: Message Sending
test_cases.description: Test sending a message in a chat room
steps: Type a message in the input field
Click send button or press Enter
Verify message appears in the chat
Verify message shows sender name and timestamp
Verify input field is cleared after sending
test_cases.expected_result: Message sending works correctly and displays in chat

test_cases.name: Room Creation
test_cases.description: Test creating a new chat room
steps: Verify room creation modal is displayed
Verify new room is created and appears in the list
Verify new room is automatically selected
test_cases.expected_result: Room creation works correctly and creates new rooms

test_cases.name: Real-time Messaging
test_cases.description: Test real-time message updates via WebSocket
steps: Open another browser tab/window with same room
Send a message from one tab
Verify message appears in real-time in other tab
test_cases.expected_result: Real-time messaging works correctly via WebSocket

test_cases.name: Message Search
test_cases.description: Test searching for messages in chat rooms
steps: Verify search works across all rooms
Clear search to show all rooms
test_cases.expected_result: Message search works correctly and filters results

test_cases.name: Message Reactions
steps: Verify reaction is added to message

test_cases.name: Message Replies
steps: Click reply button on a message
Verify reply is displayed with thread context
test_cases.expected_result: Message replies work correctly and show thread context

test_cases.name: Message Editing
steps: Click edit button on the message
test_cases.expected_result: Message editing works correctly and shows edit indicators

test_cases.name: Message Deletion
steps: Click delete button on the message
Verify message is removed from chat
test_cases.expected_result: Message deletion works correctly with confirmation

test_cases.name: File Sharing
steps: Verify file upload progress is shown
Verify file is attached to message
Verify file is displayed in chat
test_cases.expected_result: File sharing works correctly and displays file previews

test_cases.name: Typing Indicators
steps: Open another browser tab with same room
Verify typing indicator appears in other tab
Verify multiple users typing is handled
test_cases.expected_result: Typing indicators work correctly in real-time

test_cases.name: User Presence
steps: Verify online status indicators are displayed
Check different user statuses (online, offline, away)

test_cases.name: Error Handling
test_cases.description: Verify graceful handling when WebSocket fails or API errors occur
steps: Verify chat remains functional after reconnection
Simulate API failure for room loading
Verify error handling for failed operations
test_cases.expected_result: Chat handles connection failures gracefully with reconnection
